name: abEnConsumption
label: AB EN Consumption
description: EN consumed by Assault Boost.

name: abThrust
label: AB Thrust
description: Thrust of Assault Boost movement.\n\nHigher values correspond to swifter rush attacks.

name: accumulativeImpact
label: Accumulative Impact
description: Accumulative ACS overload performance.\n\nThis corresponds to sustained ACS strain, which is alleviated over time.

name: ammunitionCost
label: Ammunition Cost
description: Cost per round fired.\n\nAt the end of each mission, the total number of rounds fired is used to calculate ammunition expenses.

name: antiEnergyDefense
label: Anti-Energy Defense
description: Defense rating against energy damage.

name: antiExplosiveDefense
label: Anti-Explosive Defense
description: Defense rating against explosive/incendiary damage.

name: antiKineticDefense
label: Anti-Kinetic Defense
description: Defense rating against kinetic damage.

name: ap
label: AP
description: Resilience of the part.

name: armsLoadLimit
label: Arms Load Limit
description: Maximum weight arms can carry without compromising on stable operating performance.\n\nHigher values make it easier to manipulate arm weapons, mitigating dips in target tracking and recoil control caused by overload.

name: atkHeatBuildup
label: ATK Heat Buildup
description: Heat buildup when attacking.\n\nOverheat occurs when value exceeds the maximum tolerance.

name: attackCount
label: Attack Count
description: Number of projectiles/submunitions per attack.

name: attackPower
label: Attack Power
description: Damage-dealing performance.\n\nDamage output can decrease due to factors such as attenuation over distance, or when ricocheting occurs.

name: attitudeStability
label: Attitude Stability
description: The maximum load the ACS can support.\n\nThe higher this value, the less likely the AC is to stagger.

name: blastRadius
label: Blast Radius
description: Size of resulting explosions.

name: boosterEfficiencyAdj
label: Booster Efficiency Adj.
description: Adjustment to booster EN efficiency.\n\nThe higher this value, the less EN consumed by Quick Boost.

name: chargeTime
label: Charge Time
description: The time it takes to complete charging.

name: chgAccumImpact
label: Chg. Accum. Impact
description: Accumulative ACS overload performance for charge attacks.\n\nThis corresponds to sustained ACS strain, which is alleviated over time.

name: chgAmmoConsumption
label: Chg. Ammo Consumption
description: Ammunition consumed by charge attacks.

name: chgAttackCount
label: Chg. Attack Count
description: Number of projectiles/submunitions per charge attack.

name: chgAttackPower
label: Chg. Attack Power
description: Damage-dealing performance for charge attacks.\n\nDamage output can decrease due to factors such as attenuation over distance, or when ricocheting occurs.

name: chgBlastRadius
label: Chg. Blast Radius
description: Size of explosions resulting from charge attacks.

name: chgEnLoad
label: Chg. EN Load
description: EN load when charging.\n\nEN is reduced if this value exceeds supply.

name: chgHeatBuildup
label: Chg. Heat Buildup
description: Heat buildup when using charge attacks.\n\nOverhead occurs when value exceeds the maximum tolerance.

name: chgImpact
label: Chg. Impact
description: ACS overload performance for charge attacks.\n\nThis corresponds to immediate ACS strain, which resets within a short period of time.

name: closeRangeAssist
label: Close-Range Assist
description: Aiming assistance performance at close range.\n\nHigher values improve aim when targeting enemies at close range (within 130 m).

name: consecutiveHits
label: Consecutive Hits
description: Number of chain attacks possible with additional inputs.

name: cooling
label: Cooling
description: Speed at which head buildup is reduced when cooling weapon.

name: damageMitigation
label: Damage Mitigation
description: Ability to mitigate incoming damage while performing a regular guard.

name: deploymentRange
label: Deployment Range
description: Area in which shield is capable of blocking attacks.

name: directHitAdjustment
label: Direct Hit Adjustment
description: Damage multiplier when attacking a staggered enemy.

name: dplyHeatBuildup
label: Dply. Heat Buildup
description: Heat buildup when deploying shield.\n\nOverheating occurs when value exceeds the maximum tolerance.

name: duration
label: Duration
description: Duration of the barrier produced.

name: effectiveRange
label: Effective Range
description: Range at which attacks are effective.\n\nThis is based on the armor of standard ACs and can vary depending on the defenses of the target.

name: effectRange
label: Effect Range
description: Range corresponding to the furthest reach of explosions.\n\nPower and impact of the explosion are reduced at this range, but enemy fire is still cancelled out.

name: enCapacity
label: EN Capacity
description: Total amount of EN available for use.\n\nHigher values enable heavy use of EN-consuming actions.

name: energyFirearmSpec
label: Energy Firearm Spec.
description:
Efficiency of EN output diverted to ranged energy weapons.

Higher values correspond to greater attack power and reduced charging time for weapons affected by this spec.

This spec does not affect weapons with independent EN output systems, such as melee weapons or plasma missile launchers.

name: enLoad
label: EN Load
description: EN load of the part.

name: enOutput
label: EN Output
description: Generator EN output.\n\nHigher values mean that the generator can support more high-burden parts, with the leftover output improving EN recovery speed.

name: enRecharge
label: EN Recharge
description: The ability of the generator to initiate EN recharge.\n\nThe higher this value, the more quickly the generator commences recovery after an EN-consuming action.

name: firearmSpecialization
label: Firearm Specialization
description: Suitability for using firearms.\n\nHigher values improve target tracking performance.

name: fullChgAccumImpact
label: Full Chg. Accum. Impact
description: Accumulative ACS overload performance for full-charge attacks.\n\nThis corresponds to sustained ACS strain, which is alleviated over time.

name: fullChgAmmoConsump
label: Full Chg. Ammo Consump.
description: Ammunition consumed by full-charge attacks.

name: fullChgAttackPower
label: Full Chg. Attack Power
description: Damage-dealing performance of full-charge attacks.\n\nDamage output can decrease due to factors such as attenuation over distance, or when ricocheting occurs.

name: fullChgHeatBuildup
label: Full Chg. Heat Buildup
description: Heat buildup when using full-charge attacks.\n\nOverhead occurs when value exceeds the maximum tolerance.

name: fullChgImpact
label: Full Chg. Impact
description: ACS overload performance for full-charge attacks.\n\nThis corresponds to immediate ACS strain, which resets within a short period of time.

name: fullChgTime
label: Full Chg. Time
description: Time it takes to reach full charge.

name: generatorOutputAdj
label: Generator Output Adj.
description: Adjustment to generator EN output.\n\nThe higher this value, the greater the final EN output of the generator.

name: generatorSupplyAdj
label: Generator Supply Adj.
description: Adjustment to generator EN supply performance.\n\nThe higher this value, the more quickly the generator resumes supply after an EN-consuming action.

name: guidance
label: Guidance
description: Tracking performance of missiles and other homing weapons.

name: highSpeedPerf
label: High Speed Perf.
description: Speed while boost is engaged.

name: homingLockTime
label: Homing Lock Time
description: Time it takes to acquire lock-on for missiles and other homing weapons.\n\nAchieve optimal tracking performance by keeping enemies in your sights for this duration.

name: idealRange
label: Ideal Range
description: Range at which attack power is guaranteed without ricocheting.\n\nApplies regardless of the target's defenses, with the exception of some special armor.

name: idleDamageMitigation
label: Idle Damage Mitigation
description: Damage mitigation for attacks caught by guard while shield is in an idle state.

name: idleImpactMitigation
label: Idle Impact Mitigation
description: ACS strain mitigation for attacks caught by guard while shield is in an idle state.

name: idleTime
label: Idle Time
description: Time until idle state ends.

name: igDamageMitigation
label: IG Damage Mitigation
description: Ability to mitigate incoming damage while performing an Initial Guard.

name: igDuration
label: IG Duration
description: Duration of the Initial Guard damage mitigation window.

name: igImpactMitigation
label: IG Impact Mitigation
description: Ability to mitigate ACS strain while performing an Initial Guard.

name: impact
label: Impact
description: ACS overload performance.\n\nThis corresponds to immediate ACS strain, which resets within a short period of time.

name: impactDampening
label: Impact Dampening
description: Ability to mitigate incoming ACS burden while performing a regular guard.

name: jumpDistance
label: Jump Distance
description: Horizontal jumping performance.\n\nHigher values correspond to higher initial speed of Quick Boost from the ground.

name: jumpHeight
label: Jump Height
description: Vertical jumping performance.\n\nHigher values correspond to higher maximum heights of jumps from the ground.

name: loadLimit
label: Load Limit
description: Maximum weight legs can support.\n\nHigher values mean that the legs can support more heavy parts.

name: longRangeAssist
label: Long-Range Assist
description: Aiming assistance performance at long range.\n\nHigher values improve aim when targeting enemies at long range (beyond 260 m).

name: magazineRounds
label: Magazine Rounds
description: Number of rounds loaded per magazine.

name: maxLockCount
label: Max. Lock Count
description: Maximum possible number of lock-ons for missiles and other homing weapons.\n\nMulti-lock is possible if this number is 2 or higher.

name: mediumRangeAssist
label: Medium-Range Assist
description: Aiming assistance performance at medium range.\n\nHigher values improve aim when targeting enemies at medium range (130-260 m).

name: meleeAtkEnConsump
label: Melee Atk. EN Consump.
description: EN consumed by movement resulting from use of melee weapon.

name: meleeAttackThrust
label: Melee Attack Thrust
description: Thrust when homing in on enemies using melee weapons.\n\nMost melee weapons are capable of homing in on enemies within certain ranges. This value increases the speed of those homing attacks.

name: meleeSpecialization
label: Melee Specialization
description: Suitability for using melee weapons.\n\nHigher values corresponding to greater attack power.

name: missileLockCorrection
label: Missile Lock Correction
description: Modifier for the time it takes to acquire lock-on for missiles and other homing weapons.\n\nThe higher the value, the less time required to complete lock-on.

name: multiLockCorrection
label: Multi-Lock Correction
description: Modifier for the time it takes to acquire multiple lock-ons for missiles and other homing weapons.\n\nThe higher the value, the less time required to complete lock-ons.

name: paInterference
label: PA Interference
description: Ability to interfere with enemy pulse barriers.\n\nThe higher this value, the easier it is to break down pulse armor or shielding.

name: postRecoveryEnSupply
label: Post-Recovery EN Supply
description: Amount of EN that is immediately recharged after generator EN supply has been restored.\n\nHigher values correspond to greater initial EN recharge after the generator recovers from complete EN depletion, enabling heavy use of EN-consuming actions following recovery.

name: qbEnConsumption
label: QB EN Consumption
description: EN consumed by Quick Boost.

name: qbJetDuration
label: QB Jet Duration
description: Duration of Quick Boost jets.\n\nHigher values correspond to greater distance traveled.

name: qbReloadIdealWeight
label: QB Reload Ideal Weight
description: Maximum tolerable AC weight before Quick Boost reload time is compromised.\n\nHigher values can support heavier ACs without suffering reduced performance.

name: qbReloadTime
label: QB Reload Time
description: Reload time for Quick Boost.\n\nLower values enable agile, consecutive usage.

name: qbThrust
label: QB Thrust
description: Initial thrust of Quick Boost movement.\n\nHigher values correspond to greater initial speed.

name: rapidFire
label: Rapid Fire
description: Speed of rapid fire.\n\nThis is the number of rounds that can be fired within 1 second.

name: recoil
label: Recoil
description: Recoil that occurs when firing.

name: recoilControl
label: Recoil Control
description: Ability to absorb recoil.\n\nHigher values mitigate accuracy reduction incurred by rapid fire.

name: reloadTime
label: Reload Time
description: Time from start to completion of reload.

name: resilience
label: Resilience
description: Resilience of the barrier produced.

name: scanDistance
label: Scan Distance
description: Range within which scanning can detect enemies or part containers.

name: scanEffectDuration
label: Scan Effect Duration
description: Scan visibility duration after having detected enemies or part containers.

name: supplyRecovery
label: Supply Recovery
description: The ability of the generator to recover after interruption of EN supply.\n\nThe higher this value, the more quickly the generator commences recovery after EN is fully depleted.

name: systemRecovery
label: System Recovery
description: Ability to detect system abnormalities and recover.\n\nHigher values correspond to lower vulnerability to system abnormalities

name: thrust
label: Thrust
description: Thrust of boost movement.\n\nHigher values correspond to greater movement speed.

name: totalRound
label: Total Round
description: Total number of rounds that can be fired.

name: travelSpeed
label: Travel Speed
description: Speed while boost is disengaged.

name: upwardEnConsumption
label: Upward EN Consumption
description: EN consumed by ascending boost movement.

name: upwardThrust
label: Upward Thrust
description: Vertical thrust of boost movement.\n\nHigher values correspond to greater ascending speed.

name: weight
label: Weight
description: Weight of the part.
